name: NMI Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
author: Mudassar Ali

sections.description:
NMI Payment Gateway for WooCommerce extension allows you to keep your customer on your site during the entire checkout process. This gives you complete control of your checkout process and shows your customer a consistent brand, building trust as well as boosting conversion.
With keeping your customer on your site during the entire checkout process and using NMI Gateway’s most secure integration method you are getting the best user experience, conversion rate and security.

Important Notes: This Gateway Implementation Requires the SSL Certificate to be Installed on your Site.


Why NMI Gateway For WooCommerce is a good fit for you store:
  • No technical skills needed.
  • Can work with sandbox/live Merchant One Payment Gateway accounts for testing purpose.
  • Seamless integration into the WooCommerce Checkout Page
  • Customers stay on your site while purchasing
  • Add custom title for gateway
  • Add custom description for gateway
  • Can choose between Authorize Only and Sale Transaction Type.
  • Card CVV code required
  • This plugin does not store Credit Card Details.
  • Robust Code plugin to add a Network Merchants Payment Gateway to woocommerce
  • Can be customized easily.

  • Debug log

    Pro Features:

  • Three Step Redirect Integration of NMI

  • Network Merchants Inc – eCheck
  • Supports Refunds from Edit Order Page.
  • Enable/Disable Customer Receipt
  • Save Cards ( User will be able to save card during checkout)
  • More Payment Gateway options (Payscape, SafeSave Payments, Tranzcrypt, PlanetAuthorize, CyoGate, MerchantGuy, SkyBank)
  • Allows you to select the card types supported by your account.
  • Transaction Type (Sale (Authorize and Capture), Authorize Only)
  • Duplicate transaction checker
  • Processor ID (If using multiple MIDs, route to this process)
  • automatically detects the country of your visitors and let’s you drive away unwanted traffic.

  • much more …

    Support
    We’re sorry you’re having problem with ‘NMI Payment Gateway for WooCommerce’ and we’re happy to help out.

  • Website of Author

  • Author CodeCanyon Profile
  • For more details you can send mail with your suggestions, recommendation to sahil_bwp@yahoo.com
sections.installation:
To Install this NMI Payment Gateway for WooCommerce plugin there is no any complexity. It’s very simple like other plugin. Just follow the procedure described below.

  1. Download the plugin from WordPress Plugin repository. After downloading the zip file extract it.
  2. Upload woo-nmi-payment-gateway plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Configure the plugin by going to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments > NMI Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
  5. You can use 4111111111111111 as testing card no.
sections.faq:
Three Step Redirect Integration of NMI?

If you are looking a Three Step Redirect Integration of NMI please see pro version or other plugin. This will not work for ‘Three Step Redirect Integration’
